ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Anderson follows Garagax after he escapes from the exorcists.
Blue is attacked by Guardsharks and heads to the city library.
A mutant comes in from the wastelands with the power to explode.
Micky Swift calls for a job centre and has to convince the Scarab Illuminati that he is "the True Jobhuter".
